description: '''Exo-SC''' ({{Korean|hangul=세훈&찬열|rr=Sehun & Chanyeol}}; stylized in [[all caps]]) is a South Korean [[Hip hop music|hip hop]] duo and the second sub-unit of South Korean-Chinese boy band [[Exo]], consisting of [[Park Chanyeol|Chanyeol]] and [[Oh Se-hun|Sehun]]. Their debut [[extended play|EP]] ''[[What a Life (EP)|What a Life]]'' was released on July 22, 2019.
